channel.title: Need help with PayPal
channel.description:
My friend is having trouble using paypal. he had a credit card but his dad got it canceled or w/e. Could anyone tell me if theres anyway for him to use paypal if hes not verified? is there any tool or any alternative to getting verified? He has 15$ and wants to buy a domain. I would appiciate any help because it would help him alot.
His Msn is: Sebastianed2002@hotmail.com My Msn is: John_95_07@hotmail.com
Thank you, John

item.title: Need help with PayPal
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

It depends on whether you have money in your PayPal.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with PayPal

item.description:

mrrules, when you use your paypal account to pay for things… Does your Moms Bank Account get Charged? Or does your Paypal Money get charged?

item.description:
@leader wrote:

In order to buy a domain, most registrars require credit card details.
